Description: When it was first updated, the widget was on the left and only took up one icon space. Later, for some reason, it moved to the right and took up several icon spaces.
Title: Yesterday, I updated Windows 11 and discovered two issues.
EnhancedContent: When it was first updated, the widget was on the left and only took up one icon space. Later, for some reason, it moved to the right and took up several icon spaces.
Author: Gordony
